title: Warning about missing `group.id` when using quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging-kafka codestart
body:
### Describe the bug

Warning about missing `group.id` when using quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging-kafka codestart

2022-01-19 14:07:20,655 WARN  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (main) SRMSG18216: No `group.id` set in the configuration, generate a random id: 71da9ccd-77a0-4710-a4fb-25cb9508ab92

Full log:
```
[INFO] Running org.acme.MyReactiveMessagingApplicationTest
2022-01-19 14:07:17,617 WARN  [io.qua.arc.dep.SplitPackageProcessor] (build-25) Detected a split package usage which is considered a bad practice and should be avoided. Following packages were detected in multiple archives:
- "io.smallrye.reactive.messaging.providers.connectors" found in [io.smallrye.reactive:smallrye-reactive-messaging-in-memory::jar, io.smallrye.reactive:smallrye-reactive-messaging-provider::jar]
2022-01-19 14:07:17,678 INFO  [org.tes.doc.DockerClientProviderStrategy] (build-3) Loaded org.testcontainers.dockerclient.UnixSocketClientProviderStrategy from ~/.testcontainers.properties, will try it first
2022-01-19 14:07:18,167 INFO  [org.tes.doc.DockerClientProviderStrategy] (build-3) Found Docker environment with local Unix socket (unix:///var/run/docker.sock)
2022-01-19 14:07:18,167 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) Docker host IP address is localhost
2022-01-19 14:07:18,205 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) Connected to docker:
  Server Version: 20.10.8
  API Version: 1.41
  Operating System: Docker Desktop
  Total Memory: 7959 MB
2022-01-19 14:07:18,208 INFO  [org.tes.uti.ImageNameSubstitutor] (build-3) Image name substitution will be performed by: DefaultImageNameSubstitutor (composite of 'ConfigurationFileImageNameSubstitutor' and 'PrefixingImageNameSubstitutor')
2022-01-19 14:07:18,865 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) Ryuk started - will monitor and terminate Testcontainers containers on JVM exit
2022-01-19 14:07:18,866 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) Checking the system...
2022-01-19 14:07:18,866 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) ‚úîÔ∏é Docker server version should be at least 1.6.0
2022-01-19 14:07:18,975 INFO  [org.tes.DockerClientFactory] (build-3) ‚úîÔ∏é Docker environment should have more than 2GB free disk space
2022-01-19 14:07:19,023 INFO  [üê≥ .io/.5.5]] (build-3) Creating container for image: docker.io/vectorized/redpanda:v21.5.5
2022-01-19 14:07:19,103 INFO  [org.tes.uti.RegistryAuthLocator] (build-3) Credential helper/store (docker-credential-desktop) does not have credentials for docker.io
2022-01-19 14:07:19,192 INFO  [üê≥ .io/.5.5]] (build-3) Starting container with ID: b0d95e1a9e246da4250abf3c5210c3adbf7a2ac88fa1ddec59999f9b32617d3b
2022-01-19 14:07:19,523 INFO  [üê≥ .io/.5.5]] (build-3) Container docker.io/vectorized/redpanda:v21.5.5 is starting: b0d95e1a9e246da4250abf3c5210c3adbf7a2ac88fa1ddec59999f9b32617d3b
2022-01-19 14:07:20,287 INFO  [üê≥ .io/.5.5]] (build-3) Container docker.io/vectorized/redpanda:v21.5.5 started in PT1.299175S
2022-01-19 14:07:20,288 INFO  [io.qua.kaf.cli.dep.DevServicesKafkaProcessor] (build-3) Dev Services for Kafka started. Other Quarkus applications in dev mode will find the broker automatically. For Quarkus applications in production mode, you can connect to this by starting your application with -Dkafka.bootstrap.servers=OUTSIDE://localhost:55002
2022-01-19 14:07:20,655 WARN  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (main) SRMSG18216: No `group.id` set in the configuration, generate a random id: 71da9ccd-77a0-4710-a4fb-25cb9508ab92
2022-01-19 14:07:20,657 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (main) SRMSG18229: Configured topics for channel 'uppercase-in': [uppercase-word]
2022-01-19 14:07:20,666 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (main) SRMSG18214: Key deserializer omitted, using String as default
2022-01-19 14:07:20,806 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (main) SRMSG18258: Kafka producer kafka-producer-source-out, connected to Kafka brokers 'OUTSIDE://localhost:55002', is configured to write records to 'word'
2022-01-19 14:07:20,837 INFO  [io.sma.rea.mes.kafka] (smallrye-kafka-consumer-thread-0) SRMSG18257: Kafka consumer kafka-consumer-uppercase-in, connected to Kafka brokers 'OUTSIDE://localhost:55002', belongs to the '71da9ccd-77a0-4710-a4fb-25cb9508ab92' consumer group and is configured to poll records from [uppercase-word]
2022-01-19 14:07:20,858 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Quarkus 2.6.2.Final on JVM started in 4.031s.
2022-01-19 14:07:20,858 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Profile test activated.
2022-01-19 14:07:20,858 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Installed features: [cdi, kafka-client, smallrye-context-propagation, smallrye-reactive-messaging, smallrye-reactive-messaging-kafka, vertx]
[INFO] Tests run: 1, Failures: 0, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 5.68 s - in org.acme.MyReactiveMessagingApplicationTest
2022-01-19 14:07:21,195 INFO  [io.quarkus] (main) Quarkus stopped in 0.279s
```

### Expected behavior

No warnings

### Actual behavior

Warnings about not sufficient config

### How to Reproduce?

 - Select quarkus-smallrye-reactive-messaging-kafka on https://code.quarkus.io/?extension-search=origin:platform%20kafka%20conn
 - download the app
 - run `mvn clean package`
 - see the logs

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS Monterey

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.6.2.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
